home_page1.title: Chinese Top-tier Cross-border Investment Bank
home_page1.logo: Connecting Chinese Institutional Investors with Best Overseas Targets for Investment and Acquisition

home_page2.high_service: Cross-border M&A and private placements of equity
home_page2.service_content: Professional financial advisory to assist clients in achieving most challenging and financial objectives
home_page2.more_industry: Most attractive projects filtered for Chinese investors
home_page2.industry_content: Deal sourcing teams deployed world-wide, partnering with over 200 top-tier investment banks and financial institutions
home_page2.project_more: Unparalleled Investor Universe in Greater China
home_page2.project_content: Active institutional investors including large conglomerates, public companies, financial institutions

home_page3.event1_title: Online Web Series “I Am A Big Deal” and Online Interview Program “InvesTarget Mini
home_page3.event1_topic: Industry experts talk about their experiences and expertise on cross-border mergers and acquisitions.
home_page3.event1_content: Sometimes we go abroad and we talk about Nationalism, saying that the interest of the country is the greatest rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. But it sounds empty. We do sometimes have this feeling that our own country is not powerful enough, that we do not really have enough assets. To conquer those feelings, we must have a strong sense of mission. People need to have a little more Chinese spirit, especially when encountering people from other countries. Having thisChinese spirit Is very important.
home_page3.event1_end: —— Min Zhidong, Chairman of South Korea Industrial Fund
home_page3.event2_content: The China Cross-border Investment Summit, held on June 16th 2016 in Beijing, aimed to gather global innovative resources, to explore new ideas for cross-border integration, and to create a more convenient and efficient environment for innovative elements of the cross-border investments, so as to comprehensively improve the level of international cooperation in Chinese enterprises in the field of technological innovation. The attendants of the summit engaged in heated debate on the topics of cross-border investments, risks prevention and control, as well as the methods to aid economy transformation.
home_page3.event3_title: Cross-Border Mergers and Acquisitions Real Cases Analysis
home_page3.event3_content: Cross-border mergers and acquisitions real case analysis activities are held by the China M & A Association of Zhejiang Branch, InvesTarget, and Grant Thorton on September 28 at Zhejiang M & A club in Hangzhou.
home_page3.event4_content: Haifa city, as the largest and most influential bridge between the two countries, the cradle of the Middle East science and technology”,will hold this summit from November 14th to 15th. The gathering will be held in the two countries. Dignitaries, industry leaders, high-tech industry officials and investors and over a thousand people will join this event. This event is not only an summary of annual scientific and technological investment results between the two countries, but also an opportunity for the two countries to engage in in-depth discussions and dialogues regarding economic and technological transformations.
home_page3.event5_title: InvesTarget Cross-Border Investment Club Launching Ceremony
home_page3.event5_content: On August 18, InvesTarget has held a cross-border investment launching ceremony and a project roadshow in the Sheng House on Shanghai Shaoxing Road. The ceremony was of great success. Ms. Cao Fangning, President of InvesTarget, Mr. Jiang Sheng, General Manager of Zhenghe International Department, Ms. Zou Zhuangyan, Senior Business Officer of Alberta Government Office of Shanghai all attended the ceremony. 'This is a great thing for our Chinese companies,' said Mr. Jiang Sheng, General Manager of Zhenghe International Department. Such an alliance can help companies that we want to invest in engage in cross-border mergers and acquisitions and to help them overcome difficulties.
home_page3.event6_content: Once a week, InvesTarget holds a running event with members of the InvesTarget investment community because InvesTarget believes that health is the most important asset. Work and health need to perfectly balanced. We all need something to ignite our passion for life, and Running with InvesTarget is a great opportunity for everyone to engage in interesting and healthy communications and exercises. A good exercise will make everything better!

home_page4.project1_description: The company was founded in 2007 to design, develop, manufacture and market devices that utilize the company’s proprietary, patented Pulsed Light technology which facilitates the optimal delivery of pulsed polymorphic light for use in light therapy

platform.title: Platform
platform.description: InvesTarget provides clients with a SaaS management platform to manage VDM project files. Once the investors, transaction managers, project suppliers establish their DataRoom, they will have their own private space to store their company and project files, and to look through the project descriptions of other companies.
platform.summary: With extensive backgrounds in investment banking and capital markets, InvesTarget's project managers have streamlined the transaction process into 11 steps utilizing InvesTarget's SaaS Platform, CRM System and Virtual Data Room:
platform.screat: Through the streamlined process, InvesTarget Project Management System can visualize and manage the transaction process effectively only disclosing confidential information to authorized parties.
platform.function1: The investors can access the materials, download and edit legal documents, and submit Letters of Interest/Term Sheets with user access control at the document level.
platform.function2: The sell-side clients can monitor the project progress, upload non-confidential and confidential corporate documents, customize data rooms for different investors and review feedback from the prospective investors
platform.function3: InvesTarget is committed to streamlining, standardizing and intellectualizing the cross-border transactions with the vision to revolutionize the investment banking industry.
platform.little_title1: The Starting Point mainly curates premium sport highlights of major leagues and teams packaged with original content
platform.content1: including reviewing of memorable moments on games, player interviews, VIP events, etc. It has its content distribute to national and regional digital publishers via a network of websites and mobile apps.Currently the Starting Point has rights to report 13 international top-class sports events including NBA, FA Premier League and F1 Racing which are popular in China. Besides, the Starting Point also cover golf and fishing matches.During the 5 years since the establishment, the Starting Point has launched three branches in New York, Florida and Toronto and has become the leading international sports online media
platform.little_title2: Desalination of Seawater and Treatment of Industrial Waste-water
platform.content2: The company is a forward osmosis desalination company focusing on energy efficient water purification from a variety of applications: saltwater, brackish water and industrial waste-water to clean water, established in California in 2010.The system uses 75% less power than the traditional water purification system.The technology reduces the cost of water treatment per cubic meter, improves the speed of water treatment and achieves the rapid regeneration of non drinking water.The company is a developer of forward osmosis water purification systems for desalination of seawater, brackish and produced water, industrial and municipal waste water as well as ZLD (Zero Liquid Discharge) markets
platform.little_title3: Design and Outsource Manufacture of the World’s Greenest and Most
platform.content3: Company is founded in 2002 in Finland, is a technology leader in high efficiency hybrid and full electric vehicle solutions and designs and outsources manufacturing of the world’s greenest and most economical electric and hybrid drivetrains with advanced software, for marine, transportation and heavy duty markets Proprietary technology protected by 2 granted, 20 pending patents on systems design, products/components and control mechanism Company owns prominent and diverse customer base, including Volvo and Chinese Dynamics etc. From the beginning to March this year, confirmed orders of €5.9 million for this year, with expected revenues of €11 million in 2016
platform.little_title4: The worldwide top luxury brand, dedicated to serve celebrities
platform.content4: The company is proud to have manufactured top luxury products for 40years, including menswear, perfume, jewelry, accessories, bespoke cars and more, all of which feature exceptionally crystallized quality and stand-out brand characteristics.Headquartered in New York, it maintains a boutique shop in Beverly Hills, Rodeo Drive.The company provides a broad range of private family services and with the accelerating growth of the company, it intends to accumulate capital and strengthen its structure adjustment
platform.content5: The company was founded in 2007 to design, develop, manufacture and market devices that utilize the company’s proprietary, patented Pulsed Light technology which facilitates the optimal delivery of pulsed polymorphic light for use in light therapy.The conventional Pulsed Light technology is a lack of regulation and uniformity over the light energy emitted for flash treatment. This leads to a lack of control over the thermal impact to the targeted region of therapy resulting in sub-optimal therapeutic outcomes. In contrast, the company's new technology permits the generation of a single flash pulse that is perfectly constant and uniform in intensity for the entire duration of the pulse, and allows the generation of multiple sub-flashes of different intensity within a single flash, which enables exquisite control over the heat generated in a target zone.In less than 5 years, the company has revolutionized the market for permanent hair removal, and now it applies this technology to the dry-eye treatment.
platform.little_title6: Household sleeping breathing disorder diagnostic equipment for preventing and diagnosing cardiovascular disease
platform.content6: Medical equipment enterprise focusing on cardiovascular and respiratory diseases. Yita, a medical equipment enterprise listed in tel av-iv stock exchange, is engaged in research and development of various kinds of noninvasive medical equipment mainly for cardiovascular and respiratory diseases. Yita was founded in 1997 whose headquarter is in Israel with branch offices in the United States and Japan.There are 140 existing employees and management teams are from renowned companies like JNJ and Syneron, etc.
platform.little_title7: One of the Most Famous Fashion TV on the World
platform.content7: The company is the largest TV channel for fashion and lifestyle around the world, one of the top three channels worldwide.The company is in an absolutely leading position, with its business in 193 countries, 550 million households, 12 million website followers, and playing in more than 4 million public places .The company owns 25 registered trademarks, more than 150 retail stores worldwide (up to 500 in 2020), and 50,000 fashion videos.The company's brand valuation is 624 million euros (Eurobrand, 2016) .

global.detail: With an extensive network rooted in China and a highly effective deal execution capability globally, InvesTarget has deal flows from 40+ countries all over the world, partnering with over 200 investment banks, consulting firms, accounting firms, law firms, incubators, accelerators and associations.

dataroom.function1_detail: A flexible virtual data room that can get you up and running in less than two hours and be easily populated with thousands upon thousands of pages
dataroom.function2_detail: An ideal platform uniquely equipped to organize, share and track documents to streamline and accelerate the due diligence process
dataroom.function3_detail: Sophisticated user access control at the document level and automatic creation of watermark for the documents accessed by each institution
dataroom.function4_detail: Full-text search capabilities insure you can get instantaneous result tailored to your specific needs on every document with accuracy

hot.title: Sector Focus
hot.detail: China’s cross broad investments tent to be more pluralistic and spread over 8 industries, including Mining, Renting and Business Services, Restaurant and Food, Culture, Sports and Entertainment, Agriculture and Fishery, Finance, Manufacturing, Information Transport, Software and Information Security Service. Advanced Manufacturing and Information Technology are the two major sectors of cross broad investment. Based on Chinese investors’ interests, InvesTarget, as an emerging investment bank specialized in cross broad merger and acquisition, have built a worldwide cooperation network and focuses on major industries, such as Information Technology, Automobiles and Components and Healthcare
hot.industry2_detail: Mobile Web, Information Security, Software Services, Internet of Things, Telecommunication Devices
hot.industry3_detail: Cosmetics, Luxury Goods, Food and Beverage, Sports Equipment, Homeware and Furniture, Clothing, Shoes, Bags, Fast Moving Consumer Goods
hot.industry4_detail: New Energy, Mining, Oil and Natural Gas, Energy Equipment and Services, Energy Conservation and Environmental Protection Technology
hot.industry5_detail: Online Games, Media Advertising, Movies and Cartoons, Tourism, Sports and Entertainment
hot.industry6_detail: Robotics, Next-gen Vehicle and Components, Chemical Engineering, Advanced Materials, Railway and Shipbuilding
hot.industry7_detail: Generics, Medical Device, Medical Service, Pharmaceuticals, Dietary Supplement, Biotechnology
hot.industry8_detail: Intelligent Hardware, Semiconductor and Electrical Compents, Financial Technology, AR/VR, Agriculture Technology
hot.industry9_detail: Real Estate Development, Residentials, Commercial Real Estate, Industrial Real Estate
